canonical_structure.name: UBX-CFG-OTP
canonical_structure.description: Writes configuration data (key ID and value pairs) for one or more configuration items to the OTP memory. The message consists of a fixed 12-byte header followed by variable length configuration data.

fields.name: cfgHeader
fields.description: File header: use u-center tool to compose the message

issues: Incorrect payload fields. The extracted fields (clearMask, saveMask, loadMask, deviceMask) belong to UBX-CFG-CFG (0x06 0x09), not UBX-CFG-OTP.

adjudication.reasoning: Six out of seven extractions consistently define UBX-CFG-OTP as having a 12-byte header ('cfgHeader') followed by a variable length data array ('cfgData'). Extraction 3 incorrectly attributes the fields of UBX-CFG-CFG (clearMask, saveMask, etc.) to this message ID. Extraction 2 uses a 'repeated_groups' construct to represent the variable data tail, which is semantically equivalent to the byte array used in the other correct extractions.
